name: ABOVE THE CLOUDS - 1 - ANIMATED
description:
A wreckage from a past that must be embraced but above all combated. The ruin of an emblem and an era. The symbol of a habit, of an almost letargic comfort. From repetition, to monotony to somnabulism. The need for a sudden awakening in a crash, brief and instantaneous. Marked forever with the seal of rupture, of the necessary discontinuity.
The order meticulously installed for the pleasure of breaking it into chaos, into an impulse, a snap. We must go now. Mark the moment, make it exist indefinitely. An end and a beginning in a singularity. Two distinct and yet confused moments.
----- ANIMATED EDITION -----
